services.name: 01. Culture
services.description: People are the most important part of any organization. I build cultures for delivering effective long-term business value.

services.name: 02. Business Value
services.description: Code is liability. I provide Business Value through code that highlights intrinsic complexity and hides incidental complexity.

services.name: 03. Turtles
services.description: The best architectures are discoverable and extendable.

featuredWorkDescription: Over the years, I've held some opinions stronger than others.
